summary: The customer was having an issue with their Contoso Wireless service and the agent offered to look into the issue. After learning that the customer had purchased a new Contoso Wireless iPhone XS, the agent recommended the latest model of the iPhone XS Max. The agent informed the customer that it would cost $999 plus tax, but could be purchased at a discounted rate of $799 plus tax if they signed up for a monthly payment plan. The customer agreed to place an order and the agent instructed them on how to do so on the website.
